remarks: Conditions for which two walks within the same undirected simple graph are the same.  It is sufficient that the vertices (in the same order) are identical.  (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 25-Aug-2018.)
statement: usg2wlkeq2 $p |- ( ( ( V USGrph E /\ N e. NN0 ) /\ ( X e. ( V Walks E ) /\ ( # ` ( 1st ` X ) ) = N ) /\ ( W e. ( V Walks E ) /\ ( # ` ( 1st ` W ) ) = N ) ) -> ( ( 2nd ` X ) = ( 2nd ` W ) -> X = W ) ) $.
